original_text:
O Israel, hope in the Lord!
    For with the Lord there is steadfast love,
    and with him is plentiful redemption.
korean_text: 이스라엘아 여호와를 바랄지어다 여호와께서는 인자하심과 풍성한 속량이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: O Israel, hope in the Lord!
For with the Lord there is steadfast love,
and with him is plentiful redemption.
